choices: He gets stuffed, and becomes an animatronic
111.content: What kind of story do you want for him?
111.title: Mike Schmidt

1111.content:
In all honesty, it would have probably been in Mike's favor to have quit his job the moment he realized just how brutally life threatening it was. He had heard what he presumed to be the last words of the man who worked the night shift before him, and it didn't take a rocket scientist to figure out that the man was most likely crushed and rotting away in an animal suit in the backroom. In Mike's defense, however, he had been the new guy, and rookies were always targets for immense pranking-- "Living without a frontal lobe?" "Forcefully shoved into a suit?" What the heck was someone supposed to make of that? Surely it had to have been a joke--

         Of course, it wasn't a joke, but it was a tad too late for Mike to make the decision to quit his job. No, it seemed that the animatronics had decided that he had been performing so wonderfully in his position that they had just so happened to find him a new position higher-up in the corporate ladder-- they were giving him a promotion of sorts. Instead of hiding "behind the scenes," Mike was going to be taking center-stage with the animatronics themselves, and none of his protesting shrieks or sporadic kicking were going to tell them different.

         Mike never thought his life would be snuffed out this way-- being stuffed into an archaic, dirty, golden bear that looked like it hadn't been touched in twenty years-- and not so soon either-- the only intimate contact he had ever had with someone was touching a bare boob, but that had been on accident during gym class his Freshman year of high school. Again, though, the animatronics didn't seem to care much that Mike was never going to be able to make a woman happy, or to make a baby of his own, or to buy a house for that special someone and second generation-- there were a lot of things Mike was never going to experience and fulfill because he had been so stubbornly ignorant to the danger before him-- his own pride in landing his first, true job had blinded him.

         With his bones crushed, many jutting from whatever flesh hadn't been torn apart by the mechanical devices within the golden bear suit that he had been stuffed within, Mike was beginning to acclimate to the pain. It was shock, probably-- there was no doubt in his mind that he was on the verge of death. He could feel his own blood dripping down his mangled body and onto the floor, and he could feel his fast-beating heart now slowly ease past a resting pace, to a more slow, worrisome beat. His breathing was soft, and his lungs were reluctant to keep going with all the blood that was crowding up the small space inside of them. Mike didn't feel panicked anymore, though. Death was inevitable now; he was beyond help and he knew it, and no one cared or would come looking for him. Instead, Mike felt...

         Calm.

         And ANGRY.

         And... sad...

         With his vision and life fading, Mike had the sinking feeling that his job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza wasn't just yet over.

11123.content:
Mike Schmidt, a student at Eastern University,awoke to the sound of the radio blaring in his ear. He slammed his hand over to turn it off. He did not want to get up, he had stayed up late partying the night before. His room mate threw a shoe at him, telling him to rise, but it just made him more aggravated. Another friend came by the room....
"Hey man get up, we've got class in ten."

Mike moaned and slowly turned over to find his friend waiting for him to get up.

"Man did I tie one on last night, I got smashed, my head is killing me."

" You know I got with Della last night, she and I had a long talk and we are going to break it off, we're not getting married."

"Boy you about did it. could you imagine if she would have married you we would not get to run the roads any longer, your too young to think about marriage right now any way."

"Man my head is really doing a number on me."
I'm going to the drug store to find something for my head, you coming with me?"

"yeah I'll come."

The two went to the corner drug store and told the man behind the counter of his head ache.

"I have something for you, that will change your life, it is a formula that will not only cure your head from hurting but it will change your life." The man handed Mike the vial and told him to follow the directions on the side of it, but he warned Mike to take it as it was directed only.

Mike took the vial and didn't even bother to read it. They went to class and in class he took the vial out and drank from it, his head hurt so bad he thought he needed all of the medicine in the vial. He went on about his day and he noticed over time that he was feeling strange he was beginning to shrink, he was no longer 5'8 he began shrinking more and more. when his classes were over he went to the dorms where he shrunk even more, he shrunk down to the size of a barbie doll, about twelve inches tall.

choices: Another animatronic snuck up behind the new Mike
1113111.content:
Mike Schmidt grumbled as he parked his car into the reserved night guard parking space. As he got out of the car, he was instantly drenched in the rain water that was flooding from the sky.

Quickly running to the front of the pizzeria, he looked up just as lightning flashed, illuminating the sign, making the entire pizzeria look demonic.

With one last sigh, Mike entered the pizzeria to start his 5th week.

____Line_Break____

3 hours later

Mike glanced at the battery to see that he had 57% left.

Smiling a bit, he said to himself, "I've had less battery than this before, and I'm still alive. Better check up on Foxy though."

Picking up the tablet, he looked at the camera in Pirate's Cove, only to see a sign with two words:

IT'S ME


Mike's eyes widened as he heard clanging coming from down the hall, "Fuck me."

Mike lept to the door, intent on shutting it before the homicidal robot got in, only to see the fox just as his hand was reaching for the button.

Somehow, Mike missed the button entirely, and hit Foxy's head instead, just as lightning struck the pizzeria. The lightning caused a brown out that lasted for a moment, making the lights in Mike's office (and that damned fan that uses power even when you're just sitting there) to turn off for a moment.

When they turned back on, Mike blinked once as he realized that he was in quite a different position than the one he was in a few seconds ago. For starters, he was looking into the office, rather than out of it, and instead of seeing a worn-down animatronic pirate fox, he saw...himself.

Then his other senses kicked in, and he realized that he could feel things that he definitely didn't feel before: like his legs. His legs felt worn out, yet strong and powerful. His chest felt...strange. Like there was something missing, and speaking of missing, he couldn't feel one of his hands. But the strangest things were definitely the fact that his face felt different, and he could see much more clearly now than a few minutes ago. (Does Foxy have a tail? I don't think so.)

Backing up in shock at seeing his doppelgänger, Mike looked in the one-way glass to see his reflection. Standing there, staring back at him was the reflection of Foxy the pirate fox.

Mike screamed, the same scream the animatronics use when they tried to get him in the past.

114.content:
From beneath the brim of her floppy 1950's vintage film noir hat Bonnie surveyed the room. Who would she chose? She was in no hurry to decide- the chase was the reward for Bonnie, what came at the end, mere icing. Her almond shaped eyes slowly took in a likely prospect, a tall fortyish stranger with a well tailored suit, and well cared for body. He had the kind of eyes she liked, the kind that focused solely on her.

"Buy a girl a drink, Mister?" Bonnie didn't purr, but her alto voice had a tremolo that definitely catlike.
"I see a woman I'd buy a distillery for - no girl." He pointed to his glass and held up two fingers to the barman. "Matt, Matt Walker, and what do they call you when you're at home?"

"They don't have to call Matt. I just appear out of thin air. The air in here is a little thick. Down your drink and let's go someplace where you can make me comfortable."

The place was Matt's apartment and the comfort was mutual. By morning Bonnie walked out in a well tailored suit and tall rangy body. Matt was left trying to work out the mysteries of garter belts.
114.title: Bonnie The body bender slinks in.

Don't be scared. We saw that you needed help. So we made you like us, and threw away the spare parts." She said. Realising what this means, your blood run cold. Or it would... If you had any left. Baby removes the purple obstruction on you eye. You realise it to be an eyelid. She looks down at you, saying " why so you think that I taught you to pretend? Ballots couldn't. So now, we have ypour mind, her mechanical parts. You try to move your head, and it works, you look at a glass panel to see.... A robotic ballerina staring back...
1541112122211.title: Waking up later

choices: To be sold at and auction?
To become a part of fnaf 2 pizzaria
15411121222111.content: "Looks like that night guard got it fixed for us!" Said the first one. "Well, let's pick her up, and put her in the truck. Hot as ever Ballora." Where are you going?
15411121222111.title: Baby hides, staff apear.

154111212221111.content:
You are moved out of the underground facility and loaded into a truck. You can't tell exactly what's going on, as you're still completely paralysed, and blinded, but you can feel the vibrations of the moving truck, carrying you to an unknown destination. Even though you can't see, or move, you can definitely feel the differences in your body, especially around the chest.

You begin to panic, and realise that you have no idea where you will end up, or how to get back to your body, if you still can. For now, you are stuck inside the robotic body of Ballora.

You finally feel the truck coming to a halt, and some men enter the back of the truck to carry you out, and transport you into another building. You hear a lot of voices speaking over each other, and feel almost overwhelmed, as you still have no idea where you are.

Suddenly, a man's voice speaks out over the others, silencing them. "Our next item," he says in a distinct voice, "Is a robotic ballerina from Circus Baby's Pizza World, in perfect condition."

You realise with dread what's happening now. You're being auctioned off as Ballora.

The voices call out, naming their prices for you, but you're too panicked to hear them.

The man calls out another number that no one else lives up to, and shouts "Sold!"

Who are you sold to?
154111212221111.title: To be sold at an auction

1541112222.content: How about Freddy's animatronic puppet, BonBon?
1541112222.title: BonBon

15411122221.content:
Michael Afton, better known in this place as Eggs Benedict, started when the lights went out. HandUnit spoke, "Due to unforeseen issues, our generators need to be reset. Unfortunately, the animatronics do not rely on generator power, and will be in a free roaming mode. This will help your job as it prevents the servos from getting locked up. You're welcome. Since time is money, and we would like to avoid paying you overtime, I feel I should offer you an experimental machine. This machine will allow you to control an animatronic of your choosing, thus allowing you to reset the power from the safety of your room. Don't worry, this machine doesn't need the generators either, and we won't dock it out of your pay if you test it. What do you say?"

Eggs took a deep breathe, before getting the machine out, and looking at the selection of choices. Eggs muttered to himself, "That bear is always there, he should work."

So, Eggs hit the button, and the next thing he knew, he could see the generators. Eggs gave a little cheer, before freezing when he heard, "See something, BonBon?"

Eggs slowly turned around to see a large Freddy head right in front of him.
15411122221.title: Small world, after all

154112.title: He is captured before he was scooped

15413.content: Who could it be then?
15413.title: Other

choices: No (start looking into custom night animatronics)
1541322.title: How about this?

choices: The FNAF movie (the real one, coming out 2018).
155.title: Start of the story.

1553.content: How about that FNAF VR game that released?
1553.title: Something else.

info.brief_description: Make the characters from Five Nights at Freddy's undergo some interesting stories
info.description:
Just like the title says, make up a new story for the characters in FNAF. This includes, but is not limited to time travel, body swapping, TG, TF, new guards, new animatronics, etc...

All I ask is that you use good grammar.
Sex is allowed, but I would prefer if you don't use it unless it's needed for the story.

Enjoy!
